C. Deciding the stages of labour
Box 10: Stages of labour 
First stage Th is is the period from the onset of labour pain to the full dilatation of the cervix, i.e. to 10 cm. Th is stage takes 
about 12 hours in primigravidas and 6–8 hours for mul
